snippet: The Giants are guaranteed a playoff berth if they close the season with two wins, but the play of their quarterback will probably determine their fate.
abstract: Sam Borden On Pro Football column holds that New York Giants playoff hopes will be largely dependent on consistent play from quarterback Eli Manning.
lead_paragraph: The Giants are guaranteed a playoff berth if they close the season with two wins, but the play of their quarterback will probably determine their fate.

headline.seo: Eli Manning’s Inconsistency at Root of Giants’ Woes
headline.main: Having Hope, but Needing a Consistent Manning
headline.print_headline: Having Hope, but Needing a Consistent Manning
